```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
hw4 <- ny_noaa %>% 
  separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") %>% 
  mutate(prcp = prcp / 10,
         tmax = as.numeric(tmax) / 10,
         tmin = as.numeric(tmin) / 10) %>%
  filter(year == "2010",
         !is.na(prcp),
         !is.na(snow),
         !is.na(snwd),
         !is.na(tmax),
         !is.na(tmin))
```
Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart 1ï¼šPlotly scatterplot
```{r scatterplot}
hw4 %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~tmax, y = ~tmin, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
          alpha = 0.5, 
          color = ~snwd)
```

Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart 2: Ploty hexplot
```{r plot2: hexplot}
hex_ggplot = hw4 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = tmax, y = tmin)) + 
  geom_hex() +
  labs(
    title = "Hex plot of maximum temperature/minimum temperature",
    x = "Maximum Temperature",
    y = "Minimum Temperature"
  )
ggplotly(hex_ggplot)
```

### Chart3: Ploty boxplot
```{r plot3:boxplot}
hw4 %>% 
    plot_ly(y = ~tmax, color = ~month, type = "box",
          colors = "Set2")
```
